questions.question: What is presales, and why is it important?
questions.answer: Presales teams bridge the gap between sales and technical expertise, helping potential customers understand how a product or service fits their needs. A strong presales function improves win rates, shortens sales cycles, and increases customer satisfaction.

questions.question: How can better presales leadership improve my team’s performance?
questions.answer: Effective presales leadership enhances collaboration, refines processes, and empowers teams to communicate value more effectively—leading to higher conversion rates and stronger customer relationships.

questions.question: What are the key challenges presales teams face?
